Title: Relates to a state income tax credit for qualified medical providers and first responders charged with caring for COVID-19 patients
Summary: Provides a $1,000 refundable state income tax credit for qualified medical providers and first responders charged with caring for COVID-19 patients for the 2020 and 2021 tax years.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to providing a $1,000 refundable state income tax credit for qualified medical providers or first responders charged with caring for COVID-19 patients; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
